page.title: 11Former foreigners on :FINTRY
page.content: Seven established residents from abroad write their thoughts: {I am reminded of my childhood, of the {country in Cap-de-ville, Trinidad. As an Italian I like the people's friendliness, village size and lovely country. {My appreciation of the natural beauty {of the lush valley with its fine trees {now equals that of my native Denmark.} The cleanliness and feeling of space appeal and the encircling hills remind me of happy college days in Shillong. {The beautiful hills are in complete {contrast to the flood plains of the {Rhine and Meuse in the Netherlands. Only 20 miles from the city it is a tranquil,scenic environment where few houses interrupt the vista. Guyanese. {It's like coming home to "Sleepy {Hollow" as Pietermaritzburg's known. I {feel comfortable surrounded by hills.
